from sys import stdin

def D(N):
    s=0
    while N>0:
        s+=2*(N%10) if N%2==0 else N%10
        N/=10
    return s%10

def sumD(N):
    return sum(D(N-i-1) for i in xrange(0,N%10))+45*((N-N%10)/10)
            
for trial in xrange(int(stdin.readline())):
    A,B = map(int,stdin.readline().split())
    print sumD(B+1)-sumD(A)
